page.title: 09ARCHERY and CLIMBING.
page.content: The facilities for outdoor sports at our local Country Park are very good. One can try target or field archery,rock_climbing,canoeing,sailing ,fishing or orienteering.The target archery is hidden in the woods.there are 12 targets and distances are from 10 to 90 metres. The area has been felled and covered with grass.It is fenced off so that passers_by are not hurt by wild arrows.Field archery is in a fairly thickly wooded area which is completely fenced off from the public. Rockclimbing is another activity. The climb is in a half man made and half natural quarry. The rock face has a place called a chimney and one has to climb up to the top and try and haul oneself up and stand up. Instructors take groups of six people for three hours at a time.
